newFile¶

utils.newFile(handle, extension, outputFolder)[source]¶

Creates a new file withe the name <handle> and the extension <extension>

Parameters:
  • handle (string) – The file name
  • extension (string) – The extension of the file
  • outputFolder (string) – The full path of where the file will be stored
Returns:

fileName – The filename allowed for the file
Return type:

string

Examples

>>> newFile("handle", "txt", "./")
'./handle.txt'

>>> newFile("handle", "txt", "./Outputting/")
'./Outputting/handle.txt'
